name: @kaumlaut/pure
description: Types and functions for a state runtime inspired by Elm and functional programming
author: Max Kaemmerer

scripts.release-minor: npm run docs && npm run build && git add ./docs && git commit -m 'update docs' && npm version minor && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release-patch: npm run docs && npm run build && git add ./docs && git commit -m 'update docs' && npm version patch && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release-major: npm run docs && npm run build && git add ./docs && git commit -m 'update docs' && npm version major && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
